summary: Completed comprehensive UX/UI audit testing of JoBoost application. All navigation, pages, and workflows are functioning correctly. The main agent's refactoring of the navigation architecture is successful.

issues: Page uses different layout without sidebar - intentional design but may confuse users navigating from sidebar

passed_tests: Landing page loads with French content and proper styling
Login flow works correctly with test credentials
Dashboard displays welcome message, stats, credits, and quick actions
Sidebar navigation - All 9 links work correctly (Dashboard, Offres, Candidatures, Créer CV, Créer Lettre, Documents, Profil, Tarifs, Paramètres)
Candidatures page - All 4 tabs functional (Toutes, Spontanées, Réponses à offres, Brouillons)
Candidatures page - Kanban/List view toggle works
Candidatures page - Add candidature modal opens and closes
Créer CV page - Step flow works (template selection -> application selection)
Créer CV page - All 4 templates available (Moderne, Classique, Créatif, Tech)
Créer Lettre page - Step flow works (style selection -> application selection)
Créer Lettre page - All 4 styles available (Professionnel, Dynamique, Créatif, Concis)
Profile page - All 5 collapsible sections work (Informations personnelles, Expériences, Formation, Compétences, Langues)
Profile page - Completion bar displays correctly
Profile page - Save button present
Settings page - All 4 sections present (Compte, Abonnement, Sécurité, Notifications)
Settings page - Logout button works
Offres page - Search input and filters work
Offres page - Grid/List view toggle works
Documents page - All 3 tabs work (Tous, Mes CV, Mes lettres)
Documents page - Mock documents display correctly
Tarifs page - All 3 plans displayed (Gratuit, Pro, Ultra)
Tarifs page - Return to dashboard link works
Legacy route /profile redirects to /profil
Legacy route /settings redirects to /parametres
Mobile responsiveness - Menu button works
Mobile responsiveness - Sidebar opens/closes correctly
Mobile responsiveness - Navigation works on mobile
critical_code_review_comments: All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing
Navigation architecture is well-structured with consistent kebab-case French routes
AppLayout component provides consistent sidebar across all authenticated pages
Legacy route redirections are properly implemented
context_for_next_testing_agent: UX/UI audit complete. All navigation links work correctly. All pages load with proper content. Mobile responsiveness is good. The Tarifs page uses a different layout without sidebar (intentional design). Legacy routes redirect correctly. All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes.
